/usr/bin/g++  CMakeFiles/jacobi.dir/examples/jacobi.cu.o -o jacobi  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi_cxx.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi.so /usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/7/libgomp.so -lpthread -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static  -L"/usr/local/cuda-10.2/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs" -L"/usr/local/cuda-10.2/targets/x86_64-linux/lib" -lrt -lpthread -ldl
